ch.codebulb.crudfaces.controller

Class Url

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.codebulb.crudfaces.controller.Url

  • public class Url
extends Object
    A simple JSF navigation outcome URL builder with support for setting parameters and the "redirect" flag.
    Since:
    0.1
    Author:
    Nicolas Hofstetter (codebulb.ch)
